body.name: Greens Steel Stainless Steel Water Bottle - 12 oz, Steel | Vacuum Insulated Double Wall with Screw Lid/Leak Proof | Thermal Travel Sports Canteen Coffee Flask
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: OTHER BOTTLES NOT KEEPING YOUR DRINK COLD? Greens Steel bottles are built to last you a lifetime. We use the latest double wall vacuum insulated technology to ensure maximum temperature retention! Say goodbye to lukewarm.
EXCLUSIVE BONUS VALUE BUNDLE - Offering unrivaled value for money: Your bottle will come with our cleverly designed ring holder & carabiner presented in a beautiful gift box.

REHYDRATE ON-THE-MOVE: Experience drinking like never before. Our push lid allows you to drink without ever unscrewing! Plus, all our bottles come with a unique & versatile attachable ring + carabiner, so you can clip your bottle to your bag and keep it handy at all times.

#1 PREMIUM QUALITY - Other companies use a cheap 201 steel & painted finish. Greens Steel bottles are made from rust-resistant 304 steel imparting NO unwanted flavors. Powder coating means your bottle is easy to grip, won’t rust or fade & will maintain its stylish colorful design.

LIFETIME GUARANTEE & 100% SATISFACTION - Yes! All Greens Steel Products come with a LIFETIME GUARANTEE! 100% Satisfaction or your money back. Order now and put us to the test! Don't settle for any less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Leakproof Bottle
reviews.reviewText: I love this bottle! It’s small and fits easily in my bag. It holds a good amount of water if you want to casually sip throughout the day or if you need a water bottle for your child.It’s built well and has a nice textured finish that’s easy to grip. The opening to drink out of isn’t too wide but standard ice cubes won’t fit in it. I love ice so for me it wasn’t a big deal to use crushed instead of whole ice.I haven’t tested it with hot liquids but it does keep beverages cold. I’ve filled it up at night with ice water and the next morning even though the ice had melted, the water was very cold.The best part is that it doesn’t leak!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my ebike
reviews.reviewText: I love this item I just ordered the wrong color by mistake. Reordered black to match my eBike. High quality item. Keeps all beverages hot/cold for long periods and rides. Recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What a great item. It does the job right. The description was accurate. Light, convenient and even if is exposed to the sun it keeps your drink cold. Great item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this bottle
reviews.reviewText: Love this bottle!Was searching for a non-plastic water bottle option and came across this. Great build, looks great, keeps water cold (haven't tried with hot water yet) for hours (last time I checked it lasted for 9 hours. But that was because I finished the water within 9 hours so it could probably lasts longer!), doesn't leak (I've only used the screw top one, haven't use the other top), and I like how they also include the carabiner for easy transport.My only issue with this is the small mouth. I can't push my bottle brush down when I'm cleaning it since the mouth is too small. But this is easily solvable by buying a bottle brush that has thinner stem so that it can fit through. Also the bottle is a bit bigger than I thought. Bought the 25oz one, it couldn't fit in the standard bottle filler drinking fountain. I had to tilt it a bit but that's not an issue at all for me. The diameter fits just nice in my bag, it's just the height.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my teen boy. Other than the cheap useless clip included, the bottle itself is holding up well. He's gone through many over the years with bottle flipping, tossing it on the ground at practice or tossing the backpack with the bottle on the side. Not sure how long the ice lasts but he hasn't complained.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This really keeps my water cold!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST OF THE TEST
reviews.reviewText: Which Stainless Steel Bottle to Buy?Faced with multiple Amazon choices, I narrowed it down to four brands of 12 ounce SS bottles that fit perfectly in my Tumi briefcase bottle pocket.1. PRICE — Here are the 12 oz bottles I tested:Koodee price = $13.99Greens Steel price = $11.99BJPKPK price = $10.99Konokyo price = $10.552. TEST METHODS:All bottles were brought to House / Room Temperature @ 70 degrees for approximately 72 hours.4 ounces of ice and8 ounces of water were placed into each bottle.Whenever I had the chance, Three random temperature readings were taken at approximately:5 hours14 hours30 hours3. Here’s how they fared (temp readings are rounded)Koodee 12 oz SS Bottle:5 hrs = 33 degrees F14 hrs = 40 degrees F30 hrs = 54 degrees FGreens Steel 12 oz SS Bottle:5 hrs = 32 degrees F14 hrs = 33 degrees F30 hrs = 43 degrees FBJPKPK 12 oz SS Bottle:5 hrs = 33 degrees F14 hrs = 36 degrees F30 hrs = 52 degrees FKonokyo 12 oz SS Bottle5 hrs = 37 degrees F14 hrs = 60 degrees F30 hrs = 68 degrees FThat’s it!All of the bottles held water,didn’t leak, didn’t sweat, and were similar in design. So if temperature doesn’t matter take your pick!However; the performance of the Greens Steel bottle is noteworthy!Cool Packaging sets it apart from the rest.Findings:Green Steel delivered on their quality promise.FAIR BALANCE:not all bottles make it out of the manufacturing process equally. Did I get a bad bottle from a batch?NO ONE asked me to conduct this informal and novice experiment. I simply wanted a good quality bottle to quit PAYING $5.00 for water once I get past TSA.That’s all folks.Good hunting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great all-around water bottle
reviews.reviewText: You can drop it without cracking and its light. It really keeps liquid hot or cold. I'm planning on buying 2 or 3 more.
Only had it for a little while, but seems very durable and keeps water cold. Nice smaller size fits in my purse better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Best insulated water bottle I had
reviews.reviewText: Really GOOD. Keep hot liquid hot for a long time. Made coffee in the early evening went camping was still hot in the morning. Summer time if you put ice in with your cold drink you will wait forever for ice to melt. Absolutely amazing how it do what it says in the description

Le produit est conforme à la description. La gourde est très belle, résistante au chocs et garde le chaud vraiment très longtemps.Attention, le format 750ml est assez imposant et lourd, je recommande peut-être la 500ml si vous vous déplacez souvent avec votre gourde.

reviews.reviewTitle: Prodotto di qualità ad un prezzo ragionevole
reviews.reviewText: Se cercate una borraccia termica su Amazon ne troverete a bizzeffe , da cinesate da pochi euro fino a raggiungere prezzi francamente esorbitanti. Questo prodotto è una ragionevole via di mezzo che sembra offrire un ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo. La costruzione è robusta e i liquidi sono mantenuti alla loro temperatura per un tempo più che sufficiente allo scopo, inoltre la presenza dei due diversi tappi , uno a vite tradizionale ed uno ad apertura a scatto aumenta il valore dell'acquisto. Dopo circa due settimane d'uso elenco quelli che a mio parere sono i punti di forza e debolezza :PRO* costruzione robusta e curata , viene detto dal produttore che l'acciaio utilizzato è il 304, che gode di buona reputazione su Internet (io non sono un esperto di acciai quindi mi limito a riportare le opinioni altrui ...)* ottima durata della funzione thermos sia con bevande calde che fredde* i 2 diversi tappi forniti sono un gradito plus di vendita, quello a vite è comodo per bere a canna , quello a scatto per versare il contenuto in un bicchiere* nessun cattivo odore di metallo o altro , basta risciacquarla e farla asciugare all'aria dopo ogni uso, vedremo col tempo se compare ruggine , ma l'impressione è molto positiva , nel caso aggiornerò la recensione* bella confezione si presenta molto bene, può essere un' originale idea regalo ad un costo tutto sommato contenuto* a giudicare da altri recensori che hanno avuto qualche problema , l'assistenza post vendita sembra essere molto seria ed affidabile , io non ho avuto problemi* molto comodo ed utile l'anello con moschettone* é dichiarata BPA freeCONTRO* ne sulla confezione , ne sulla bottiglia ne sul loro sito ho trovato informazioni su eventuali certificazioni alimentari rilasciate da enti governativi USA o Europei , solo la dicitura 'Food Grade Steel' sulla scatola , pertanto dobbiamo fidarci del produttore (la borraccia è made in China, mentre la ditta é americana da quanto si legge sul loro sito greenssteel.com)* inevitabilmente essendo acciaio le ditate rimangono sempre bene in vista , specie sul modello non colorato che ho acquistato io* rispetto alla corrispondente bottiglia di plastica/lattina ovviamente peso e l'ingombri sono maggiori (a vuoto vi porterete dietro circa 300 grammi per il mezzo litro che è lungo 26 cm)In sintesi un'ottima scelta che mi sento di consigliare.Spedizione Amazon non velocissima (la mia bottiglia é arrivata dall'Inghilterra) ma tutto sommato tempi accettabili.

Produit de très bonne qualité, ne prend pas trop de place (j'ai commandé le 500ml), bonne prise en main. L'eau reste fraîche un bon moment. Je n'ai pas encore testé avec du chaud mais ça a l'air de fonctionner également. Les accessoires sont supers pratiques. Je recommande sans hésitation !
